title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Devin Haney on George Kambosos
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Devin Haney on George Kambosos
description:
Chris is joined by friend of the program, Keith Idec to talk about the agreement of Canelo-GGG III. Keith reacted to the decision from Canelo to fight GGG and not have a rematch with Bivol. Later, Devin Haney stops by to talk about training in Australia, fighting George Kambosos, and how this is a different fight for him without his father in his corner. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
